discover.instruction: Read this formal speech. Notice the unusual word order in some sentences.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай эту официальную речь. Обрати внимание на необычный порядок слов в некоторых предложениях.

content.text: <highlight>Never have I seen</highlight> such dedication. <highlight>Rarely does one find</highlight> such talented people. <highlight>Not only did</highlight> they work hard, <highlight>but they also</highlight> inspired others. <highlight>Only after years of effort did</highlight> they achieve success. <highlight>Little did they know</highlight> what challenges lay ahead. <highlight>Under no circumstances should</highlight> we forget their sacrifice. <highlight>Had I known</highlight> about their struggles, I would have helped. <highlight>So impressed was I</highlight> that I couldn't speak.
content.question: What happens to the word order after these negative or emphatic expressions?
content.question_ru: Что происходит с порядком слов после этих отрицательных или эмфатических выражений?

theory.title: Inversion - Question Word Order for Emphasis
theory.title_ru: Инверсия - Порядок слов вопроса для усиления

points.rule: After negative adverbs: Never/Rarely/Seldom/Hardly + aux + subject + verb
points.rule_ru: После отрицательных наречий: Never/Rarely/Seldom/Hardly + вспомогательный + подлежащее + глагол
points.example: Never have I seen this. Rarely does he complain.

points.rule: Not only...but also: Not only + aux + subject + verb, but...also
points.rule_ru: Not only...but also: Not only + вспомогательный + подлежащее + глагол, but...also
points.example: Not only did she win, but she also broke the record.

points.rule: Only + time/after/when: Only then did..., Only after X did...
points.rule_ru: Only + время/after/when: Only then did..., Only after X did...
points.example: Only then did I understand. Only after leaving did I realize.

points.rule: Little/Few: Little did I know... Few people do...
points.rule_ru: Little/Few: Little did I know... Few people do...
points.example: Little did she know what was coming.
Had I known = If I had known. Were I you = If I were you.

comparison_table.normal: She not only won but also...
comparison_table.inverted: Not only did she win, but she also...

notice.instruction_ru: Найди все предложения с инверсией. Определи триггер и перепиши в обычном порядке.

tasks.text:
A graduation speech:

"Rarely have I felt so proud. Never before has this university produced such outstanding graduates. Not only have you excelled academically, but you have also contributed to our community. Little did you know when you started how much you would grow. Only through hard work did you reach this day. Hardly had you begun when challenges appeared. Yet here you are! Should you ever need guidance, remember your professors are here. Had we not believed in you, you wouldn't be here today. Seldom does one see such potential."

find.normal: This university has never before produced

notice.reflection_question: Why is inversion used in formal speeches and writing?
notice.reflection_question_ru: Почему инверсия используется в официальных речах и письме?

sentences.normal: I have never heard such nonsense.
sentences.inverted: Never have I heard such nonsense.

sentences.normal: He not only apologized, but he also offered to help.
sentences.inverted: Not only did he apologize, but he also offered to help.

sentences.normal: I realized only later what had happened.
sentences.inverted: Only later did I realize what had happened.

sentences.normal: They little knew about the danger.
sentences.inverted: Little did they know about the danger.

sentences.normal: If I had seen him, I would have said hello.
sentences.inverted: Had I seen him, I would have said hello.

produce.instruction: Write a formal speech or essay using inversion for emphasis.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши официальную речь или эссе, используя инверсию для усиления.
produce.example: Never before has our country faced such challenges. Rarely do we see citizens come together like this. Not only have we overcome obstacles, but we have also grown stronger. Little did we know last year what was ahead. Only through unity did we survive. Under no circumstances should we forget the lessons learned. Had we not supported each other, we would have failed. Seldom does one generation face such tests. Yet here we stand, stronger than ever. Should future challenges arise, we will be ready.
criteria: Uses negative adverbs with inversion (never, rarely, seldom)

texts.title: Award Acceptance
texts.content: Never have I felt so honored. Rarely does an artist receive such recognition. Not only did you vote for me, but you also gave me confidence. Little did I know when I started this journey where it would lead. Only through the support of my fans did I succeed. Had it not been for my family, I would have given up. Seldom do I express my emotions publicly. But tonight, so grateful am I that I must say thank you.

texts.title: Historical Speech
texts.content: Never before has our nation stood at such a crossroads. Rarely have the choices been so clear. Not only must we act, but we must also act now. Only through decisive action will we succeed. Under no circumstances can we retreat. Little do our enemies know our true strength. Had our founders seen us today, they would be proud. Should we fail, future generations will judge us harshly. Were I to predict, I would say victory is near.

texts.title: Book Review
texts.content: Seldom have I read such a captivating novel. Never before has an author moved me to tears like this. Not only is the plot gripping, but the characters are also unforgettable. Little did I expect to finish it in one sitting. Only after closing the book did I realize its true impact. So powerful was the ending that I couldn't sleep. Had I known about this author earlier, I would have read everything. Rarely does literature achieve such perfection.

texts.title: Scientific Discovery
texts.content: Never before has science made such a breakthrough. Rarely do discoveries change our understanding so completely. Not only have we found the answer, but we've also opened new questions. Little did researchers know when they began what they would find. Only after years of work did the pieces come together. Had Einstein seen this, he would have been amazed. So revolutionary is this finding that textbooks must be rewritten. Seldom does a single discovery matter so much.

texts.title: Sports Commentary
texts.content: Never have I witnessed such a comeback! Rarely does a team recover from such a deficit. Not only did they equalize, but they also won in overtime. Little did anyone expect this result. Only in the final minutes did they find their form. Had the coach not made that substitution, they would have lost. So dramatic was the finish that fans couldn't believe it. Seldom do we see such determination. Had you told me earlier, I wouldn't have believed it.
